description:
Refactor PasswordStoreDefault on Linux to store the logins in a LoginDatabase
instead of using WebDataService. Once PasswordStoreWin is migrated as well,
PasswordStoreLinux will likely be folded back into PasswordStoreDefault.

BUG=35038
TEST=PasswordStoreLinuxTest.*

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=44679

messages.text:
Hi Stuart/Tim,

Here's the second to last patch of the migration to LoginDatabase: moving Linux to LoginDatabase. I've temporarily renamed PasswordStoreDefault to PasswordStoreLinux because win still uses PasswordStoreDefault. In my next patch, I'll move win to LoginDatabase and rename PasswordStoreLinux back to PasswordStoreDefault.

Thanks!
Alber

http://codereview.chromium.org/1525026/diff/8001/9004
File chrome/browser/password_manager/password_store_linux.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/1525026/diff/8001/9004#newcode97
chrome/browser/password_manager/password_store_linux.cc:97: true);
Shouldn't the passwords be cleared from the WDS at this point? (If so, the unit tests should be updated to check that).

http://codereview.chromium.org/1525026/diff/8001/9007
File chrome/browser/profile.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/1525026/diff/8001/9007#newcode1198
chrome/browser/profile.cc:1198: if (!ps->Init())
Remove this?

http://codereview.chromium.org/1525026/diff/8001/9010
File chrome/common/pref_names.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/1525026/diff/8001/9010#newcode745
chrome/common/pref_names.cc:745: // LoginDatabes.
Typo, LoginDatabase.

http://codereview.chromium.org/1525026/diff/8001/9004
File chrome/browser/password_manager/password_store_linux.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/1525026/diff/8001/9004#newcode97
chrome/browser/password_manager/password_store_linux.cc:97: true);
On 2010/04/13 22:41:53, stuartmorgan wrote:
> Shouldn't the passwords be cleared from the WDS at this point? (If so, the unit
> tests should be updated to check that).
Yes the passwords should be removed. I've updated the code and tests.

subject: Refactor PasswordStoreDefault on Linux to store the logins in a LoginDatabase
